Name: Introvert
About the game: Genre: Kinetic visual novel (without choices). Maxim Zaslavsky's new apartment is a whole different reality, in wich there's no place for outside problems: People, conversation or any interaction at all. But this fragile, intimate world of his gets turned over by the appearance of a mysterious girl.
